p: Gutierrez et al. (2019) [ 43] studied the activity of the OE of Phania matricarioides (Spreng.) Griseb. against T. brucei trypomastigotes. The main compounds identified in the EO were lavandulyl acetate and thymyl isobutyrate. The inhibitory action of the EO against T. brucei was observed at an IC 50 = 8.0 Âµg/mL (SI = 4.0).
